old: To continue using this site we need to confirm that you are over 18 and accept the Terms or Service

chatRules.hello: Welcome to the chat of CSGORace. In order to create pleasant environment in our community we decided to set up a few simple rules:

points.p5: You can communicate only by using the language of this chat
points.p6: Do not send outer links without moderator approval
points.p7: Do not advertise any social media accounts
points.p8: Message must contain more than 1 word

chatRules.mute: After the violation of any listed above rules, you will receive a warning from our moderator and if you do not comply, you will be muted for 7 days
chatRules.ban: If you are confident that didn’t break any rules and was unfairly banned, feel free to contact our support team
